name: Lonia Saga 2
description:
Kingdom of Balonia's underground dungeon is opened.
Use various tools to collect resources and make items to explore the dungeon.
The 100-level dungeon created randomly has a variety of monsters, powerful skills and a treasure box waiting for you.
(You can only go up to the 40th level during early access)
See the town's beauty through its various weather by day and night.
Check the elements of the monsters that change with the weather.


  • Story

You are an adventurer exploring the continent of Balinos,
unlocking the seal of the kingdom and starting your adventure
with a newly opened underground dungeon.
Help Gawain to repair the town.


  • Dungeon

The Logue-like dungeon consists of 40 floors (Early access). As we go deeper
Discover more treasures, skills, ores against stronger monsters.

  • Battle

Monsters become stronger as the dungeon stage becomes deeper.
You need various equipment and upgrade skills to deal with stronger monsters.
Especially, monsters become properties like the weather. If you change attack attributes, more colorful skills are activated.

  • Mining

Collect a variety of dirt, wood, and ore from all over the dungeon.
Collected materials are needed to build more powerful weapons and armor.
Combine various items from the monster to prepare a higher level of material.

  • Item Craft

Use various materials to prepare weapons, potions, and various items necessary for the survival of the food.
You can increase the level of the material by combining the same materials.
Items made from high-level materials will perform even better.

  • Quest

Take the daily quests of the village merchants and resolve them. Quests are updated every day.
